sayali_mani wrote:

> I want to send a mail saying that the junit test suite has passed or
> not .Can i do it .
> I know we can use java to do this ,but still need some directions on
> this.
> Can any1 plz help

This is something that CruiseControl does and is a common reason to use 
it. Start at cruisecontrol.sourceforge.net, or purchase the book 
"Pragmatic Project Automation" from pragmaticprogrammers.com. It is an 
excellent book that describes different ways to use automation on a 
project, and sending e-mail after a JUnit test run is one of those ways.

Good luck.
